title: Women's 30s Brief Elegant Mermaid Sleeveless Gowns Formal Evening Dress
description: Fabric: This dress is made of polyester and spandex fabric, which is durable, wrinkle-resistant, stretchy, comfortable, breathable and easy to care for
Waist and Hip-hugging design: The gown is designed with wrap-around hip and waist design to make it fit snugly around the waist and hip line, elegantly outlining a woman's delicate figure
Unique design: Sleeveless and back V-shaped design, long evening dress with floor-length skirt can cover most of the shoes, highlighting your noble temperament.

Size and Care: The evening dress sizes are designed according to standard sizes.If your height or weight is more than standard, just choose one or two bigger size.Dresses are ironed at about 120 to 191 degrees, short ironing time and easy care.
Applicable Occasions: Evening dresses, cocktail parties, wedding, prom, graduation, business meetings, banquets, bridesmaid dresses, birthday parties and other important formal occasions can be worn.
